text: The last-laps are often the most challenging yet rewarding! Yet as #COVID19 #vaccine programs kick-off in #Canada, it won't until some time after BOTH DOSES that we can resume in-person gatherings. Doing so prematurely may invite personal #LegalLiability. https://t.co/2wug9OJcqH https://t.co/KM7zoB5WUU
